notes: Very modern, newly renovated apartment with high-end finishes including marble-look tile flooring, recessed lighting, wall-mounted AC, and quality furnishings. Clean and bright with large windows providing good natural light. For baby safety, the glass coffee table has sharp edges and the bathroom has hard tile floors and glass shower enclosure that would need childproofing; no visible balcony railings or stairs. The polished tile floors may be slippery when wet.
